Network is not connected, Press “OK” to reconnect or press “Cancel” to ignore!
Fault Code:
Fault Info:
Prompt Code:
Information Tips:

"IPTV STB failed to get IP address.
Please do the steps below: 1. Make sure your internet connection working normally. 2. Make sure STB LAN connected to port 4 on modem (ONT). 3. Restart STB by press the power button. 4. When the problem still occurred, please restart modem (ONT), after 3 minutes repeat the step 3. 5. If the problem still occurred, please report on MyIndiHome application. You can download it on App Store or Play Store."

"Your Modem (ONT) and IPTV STB are disconnected.
Please do the steps below: 1. Make sure modem's (ONT) power is on. 2. Make sure your Ethernet (LAN/UTP) cable has been connected corectly. 3. If the problem still occurred, please report on MyIndiHome application. You can download it on App Store or Play Store."
Network access failed, please try again by reboot the STB or the wireless router. If still fails, please call the customer service hotline 10086.
Please call the customer service hotline 10086.
Network access failed, dial-up again after 5 min. If still fails, please call the customer service hotline 10086.
Network access failed, dial-up again after 5 min. If still fails, please call the customer service hotline 10086.

Please check the network cable is off or the wireless router working OK.
Network access failed, please check the network cable is off or the network access device is on. If still fails, please call the customer service hotline 10086.
Please try again by reboot the STB. If still fails, please call the customer service hotline 10086.

Wireless network access failed. Please check the wireless network accessing status, check the wireless network access device is on, check the wiless network username and password is OK. If still fails, please call the customer service hotline 10086.

"IPOE dial-up is failed!
Please use the correct way of dial-up user name and password."

"Sorry, network access failed!
Please check by the following steps: 1.Check if the netwire acess OK. 2.Power off the STB and reboot."

"Sorry, network access failed!
Please check by the following steps: 1.Please check the network cable is off or the network access device is on. 2.Power off the STB and reboot."

"Sorry, no available wireless network
Please check by the following steps: 1.Check the wireless network accessing status. 2.If the wireless router working OK. 3.Using wired network."

"Sorry, no available wireless network
Please check by the following steps: 1.Check the wireless network accessing status. 2.If the wireless router working OK. 3.Using wired network."

"IPTV account name or password error!
1. Power off the STB, and turn it on after 5 minutes. 2.Or dial 10000 to contact customer service."

"Please try to:
1. Reboot the STB. 2. Or dial 10000 to contact customer service."
Sorry, abnormal connection! Please check the network cable is off or the network access device is on. Check and try again, if still fails, please call the customer service hotline for help.

Sorry, the wireless card failed to load! Please check the wireless card is connected properly, try again later, if still fails, please call the customer service hotline for help.
Sorry, network access failed! Please check the network access device is on. Check and try again, if still fails, please call customer service hotline for help.

"Network access failed, please try again,if still fails, please call customer service hotline for help!
Suggested operation for User: 1.Reboot the STB. 2.Enter the configuration interface, view the configuration information."

"Network is not connected, please try again after checking it,if still fails, please call customer service hotline for help!
Suggested operation for User: 1.Check the STB network connection. 2.Enter configuration interface, for STB network parameter configuration."
"ireless network access failed! uggested operation for User: 1.Try to connect wireless. 2.Enter configuration interface, for STB configuration."

"Sorry, network access failed!
Suggested operation for User: 1.Try to restart the STB. 2.If you press the above operation, the problem is not resolved, call the 10000 customer service."

"Sorry, WIFI connect failed!
Suggested operation for User: 1.Please confirm the WLAN key of broadband modem is opened, ensure WLAN lights lit. 2.Try to reconnect WIFI. 3.Enter the interface of Setting,view the STB configuration. 4.If you press the above operation, the problem is not resolved, call the 10000 customer service."

"Sorry, network cable of STB disconnected
Suggested operation for User: 1.Please check network cable of STB is connected . 2.Enter the interface of Setting,view the STB configuration. 3.If you press the above operation, the problem is not resolved, call the 10000 customer service."
Network is not connected, Press “OK” to reconnect or press “Cancel” to ignore!
Sorry, time is synchronised failed!
Sorry, time is synchronised failed!
Error Code：
Error Message：

"Sorry, network connection failed!
1.Please check whether network cable is connected. 2.Please try to reboot your STB. 3.If all the above steps failed, please call 10000 to get more help."

"Abnormal network connection!
1.Please check whether the cable between your STB and HG is connected. 2.Please check whether the HG is working. 3.Please check whether your STB’s network settings is correct. 4.Please reboot your STB, if the error still exists, please contact the device vendor."

"Abnormal network connection!
1.Please check whether there are other devices that use this static IP address. 2.Please check this device information on the DHCP server. 3.Please check whether STB’s network settings is correct."

"Abnormal network connection!
1.Please check whether the DHCP server is reachable. 2.Please check whether the DHCP serve is normal. 3.Please check whether STB’s network settings is correct."

"Network account information error, no response!
Please check whether DHCP’s account and password is correct."

"Abnormal network connection!
1.Please try to reboot your STB. 2.Please check whether the network between STB and PPPoE server is reachable. 3.Please check whether PPPoE server is normal."

"Abnormal network connection!
Please check whether PPPoE settings is correct."
"Network account information error! lease check whether PPPoE’s account or password is correct."

"Time synchronization failed!
1.Please check whether the network between your STB and NTP server is reachable. 2.Please check whether NTP server is normal."

"Time synchronization failed!
1.Please check whether the network between your STB and DNS server is reachable. 2.Please check whether your STB’s DNS address is correct."
"Time synchronization failed! lease check whether the parsing records on the DNS server are correct."

"Loading wireless network card failed!
1.Please check whether wireless network card works normally. 2.Please reboot your STB, if the error still exists, please contact the device vendor."
"No wireless network is available! .Please check wireless network settings is correct. 2.Please reboot your STB, if the error still exists, please contact the device vendor."
Error Code:
Error message:

"Sorry, network access failed!
Please click Retry button to try to re-connect, if still fails, check the following steps: 1.Try to restart STB; 2.If by the above operation, the problem is not resolved, call the 10000–4–2 customer service."

"Sorry，Equipment malfunction, unable to provide services!
Please contact customer service."

"Sorry, network access failed!
Please click Retry button to try to re-connect, if still fails, check the following steps: 1.Turn off the STB power supply, 5 minutes then turn on the power; 2.If you press the above operation, the problem is not resolved, call the 10000–4–2 customer service."

"Sorry, network access failed!
Please click Retry button to try to re-connect, if still fails, check the following steps: 1.Turn off the STB power supply, 5 minutes then turn on the power; 2.If you press the above operation, the problem is not resolved, call the 10000–4–2 customer service."

Network problems: the network is not connected. Please check if the cable is connected securely. If there is a problem, please call Beijing Unicom customer service phone 10010.

Network problem: IP address conflict. It is recommended to reboot the router, and reboot the set-top box after router booted. If there are problems, please call Beijing Unicom customer service phone 10010.

Network problem: get IP address failed. It is recommended to reboot the router, and reboot the set-top box after router booted. If there are problems, please call Beijing Unicom customer service phone 10010.
"Check TV is power off or standby, STB will power off in 15 seconds. If you see this tip, you can turn off this feature in setting. Press any key to cancel."
Update is available. Press “OK” to download now or press “Cancel” to quit.
USB Update is available. Press “OK” to download now or press “Cancel” to quit.
Entering screensaver …
You have a long time done nothing, STB will power off in one minute, you can press any key to cancel it!

Checking user config info now, please wait.
Tips:
Please input the serial number with 6 digits
Writing the config info now, do not power down! STB will reboot afer writing config success.
Reboot
Configuration has been modified, so need to reset the STB. Press “Reboot” to reset the STB or press “Cancel” to ignore!
STB is resetting......
You have watched TV for a long time, to protect your vision please watch TV alittle later. If you want to continue, press any key!
Respect of customer, because you long time not to operate, the set-top box of Unicom Television will enter standby mode after 30 s, please press any key to cancel!
Warm Tips:
seconds remaining:
s
System is going to execute Factory Reset operation, Press “OK” to confirm or press “Cancel” to ignore!
System is going to sleep, Press “OK” to confirm or press “Cancel” to ignore!

"Sorry, the STB physical self test error！ Please check the following steps: 1、Please try to reset the STB; 2、If the problem has not been resolved, please call 10000 customer service hotline for consultation;"
"Time synchronization failure Some functions may be affected。"
Network account password input error, please re-enter. If the problem has not been resolved, please call 10000 customer service hotline for consultation.
Invalid connection network account established, please wait 10 minutes after the restart shutdown. If you still can not login, please call the customer service hotline 10000 for consultation.
Set top box is not configured. Please call 1218 for assistance.
Network is not accessible. Restart STB, If the problem still persists, call 1218 for assistance.
Network is not accessible. Restart STB, If the problem still persists, call 1218 for assistance.
Network is not accessible. Please try again later.
Username or password is incorrect. Please call 1218 for assistance on STB Configuration.
Check your ADSL connectivity. Call 1218 for assistance.
The network cable is not connected. Reconnect the cable. If the problem still persists call 1218 for assistance.
Wireless device cannot be detected.
Network is not accessible. Restart STB, If the problem still persists, call 1218 for assistance.

"Network is not connected, please check the network！ 1. Please check the terminal (modem or router) which connected to the set-top box is on. 2. Please check network cable which connected to the set-top boxes and broadband is plugged in tight (the green of the set-top box lamp indicates normal). 3. If the set-top box lamp does not light, please replace network cable and try again. 4. The standby light of Set-top box is green, please reboot the set-top box to try again. 5. Please contact our customer support staff and provide the error code displayed on the page."

"Failed to obtain an IP address automatically！ 1. Please reboot the set-top box to try again. 2. Configure the fixed IP in the set-top box to try. 3. Please contact our customer support staff and provide the error code displayed on the page."
"Wireless network connect failed！ 1. Please reboot the wireless device to try again. 2. Please contact our customer support staff and provide the error code displayed on the page."
"The account or password of PPPoE is incorrect！ 1. Please reboot the set-top box to try again. 2. Please contact our customer support staff and provide the error code displayed on the page."
"PPPoE is failed to get IP address！ 1. Please reboot the set-top box to try again. 2. Please contact our customer support staff and provide the error code displayed on the page."

"Time synchronization failed！ 1. Please make sure a correct NTP sever address has been configured. 2. Please reboot the set-top box. 3. Please contact our customer support staff and provide the error code displayed on the page."
Install success, ready to restart IPTV.
scan qr code, download the zhikuan life around you cowcatcher expert

"Home network disorder A failure is detected,please complete the following steps to check: 1.Please check whether the cable connection normal 2.Please try to restart the STB If follow the above operation,the problem is still not solved,Please scan qr code to failure."
"Circuit failure or AAA authentication failure ADSL account or password incorrect A failure is detected,please scan the qr code."
"Circuit failure or AAA authentication failure ADSL dial-up timeout no response A failure is detected,please scan the qr code."
"Circuit failure or AAA authentication failure The DHCP server no response A failure is detected,please scan the qr code."
Home network obstacles (Broken cable or wire sequence is wrong)
Circuit failure or AAA authentication failure
Error Code:
Network connection is disconnected, please check the cable between the set-top box and Modem or switch is loose, thank you!
Set top box software load failed, please try to restart the set-top box, if invalid, please contact customer service, thank you!

"Sorry, network connection failed!
Please complete the following steps to check: 1. please check whether the cable is normal connection, check the network connection device is working properly. 2. power and try to restart the set-top box. 3. if the above operation, the problem is still not solved, please call customer service hotline at 10010 for consultation."

"The set-top box network connection failed!
Please complete the following steps to check: 1. please check the network cable is normal connection. 2. power and try to restart the set-top box. 3. please try to check the set-top box, modem, and separator connection cable is normal."

"Not found the available wireless networks!
Please press set button to enter the network Settings, follow these steps to try to solve: 1. please check the wireless network connection status. 2. please check whether the wireless router to work normally. 3. suggest to change the cable connection."
Your set top box has not been turned off for a long time. It will automatically restart in 1 minute
Your set top box has not been turned off for a long time. It will automatically restart in 1 minute

Respect of customer, because you for a long time did not reboot , the set-top box will reboot after 1 minute, you can click on the Reboot to reboot immediately, or click the Delay for 4 hour after reboot!
Your Set-Top Box will restart automatically in 10 seconds...
Restart Now
